orbit.preprocess — Preprocess User Inputs¶

synopsis

Module to handle pre-processing of user inputs.

Note

  • Lat must be in the range -pi/2 to pi/2, while lon must be in the range -pi to pi

class orbitpy.preprocess.PreProcess(specs={}, user_dir=None, oci_dir=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to handle pre-processing of user inputs.

Variables

  • epoch (str) – Mission epoch in Gregorian UTC format

  • covGridFn (str) – Coverage grid filename (output file)

static compute_grid_res(orbits, instru, grid_res_fac)[source]¶

Compute grid resolution to be used for coverage grid generation. See SMAD 3rd ed Pg 113. Fig 8-13.

static compute_time_step(orbits, instru, time_res_fac)[source]¶

Compute time step to be used for orbit propagation based on the satelllite orbit and sensor specs.

static custom_orbits(data)[source]¶
static enumerate_orbits(constel={})[source]¶

Enumerate all the orbits (corresponding to unique satellites) in the constellation.

Parameters

constel (dict) – Constellation specifications (Custom or Walker Delta)

Returns

Orbits (parameters) in the constellation

Return type

list, orbitpy.preprocess.OrbitParameters

generate_prop_cov_param()[source]¶

Generate propagation and coverage parameters. Each enumerated orbit (in the constellation) corresponds to one set of propagation and coverage parameters.

static process_cov_grid(user_dir, grid, grid_res)[source]¶

Process coverage grid (auto or custom) and return the filename with path containing the grid info.
